utilities

Interface IGameWorld

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameWorldProxy, GameWorld, MapViewProxy, ScoreViewProxy

    public interface IGameWorld
    Interface for game worlds and their respective proxies.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 3/22/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accelerateCar()
      Accelerate the player's car.
      void addFuelCan()
      Adds a fuel can to the game world of a random size and location.
      void addFuelCan(Location2D location, int size)
      Adds a fuel can to the game world.
      void addPylon(int sequenceNumber, Location2D location)
      Adds a pylon to the game world.
      void advanceGameTime(int elapsedTime)
      Advances the game clock by a single "tick" and updates all game objects.
      void brakeCar()
      Apply the brakes on the player's car.
      void generateNewColors()
      Generates new random colors for the objects in the game world.
      int getCurrentPylon()
      Gets the last pylon reached by the player's car.
      java.lang.String[] getGameStates()
      Gets the various states the world tracks.
      IIterable<IDrawable> getMapViewIterator()
      An iterator of drawables for the map view to use.
      boolean isSoundOn()
      Informs if the game sound is on.
      void setSoundOn(boolean soundOn)
      Sets the sound to be on or off.
      void steerCar(ISteerable.Direction direction)
      Sends a steer command to the player's car.

      • getGameStates

        java.lang.String[] getGameStates()
        Gets the various states the world tracks.
